level.description: You now have access to the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> tool. The <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> will print output if you use it on <color=#ffff00ff>yellow</color> text. Use the BUGCATCHER to catch the bug once you know where it is. You can use TAB to switch between tools.
level.introtext: Time to learn a new tool: <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTERS</color>. They can show you output from the code.
level.endtext: Now it's your turn, use the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTERS</color>!
